Summary: Bright Orange-Reddish Light, also a Green second one
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: It was Tuesday night on March 15th at approx.11pm.I was walking towards my house a couple of blocks away and I stopped for the light.While waiting,a bright orange-reddish light appeared out of nowhere.It was just to my right and didn t appear that high,so I thought that it was a transformer going out.It was a clear sky and no rain,so I know it wasn t lighting?I stood there for a moment waiting to see if there were more,but nothing.It reminded me of the fireworks on the forth of July.I thought..ok,thats kind of strange?I Was almost home,actually,it was around the corner,when another light appeared in the sky.It caught my eye,just to the left.Again,it appeared out of nowhere.This time it was green,only it wasn t round,but more like a flair,or like a firework that is shot in the sky and slowly disapates.So I started looking to see if someone had a flair gun and was shooting it off,or maybe they were making a movie?(it s common in my area)but no such luck.Again I just stood there waiting for something alse,but nothing.I just want to say that the lights didn t appear to be really high (and this may sound strange)but appeared to be far away,even though close by..as if being projected,or brought into view,as if in a different dimension and zapped into ours.this is the best I can describe it. I ve never reported anything before.This is my first time seeing and reporting.I just had to tell someone and you guys were my best bet.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around March 16th 2005
